name: ANY.RUN
description: This app enables you to detonate files and URLs, and perform investigative actions, using the ANY.RUN interactive online malware sandbox service, thereby giving you automated analysis and advanced threat detection through an agentless sandbox

anyrun_api_key.description: API Key used for API authentication

anyrun_timeout.description: Number of seconds to wait for a request to timeout

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Get the verdict of a specific analysis
Get reports of a specific URL analysis
actions.verbose: This action requests a list of already completed reports of a URL analysis. Option search_in_public_tasks enables search in public submissions, which requires ANY.RUN TI License to work, and is disabled by default. By default, only 100 recent submissions from your own submission history are used for search.

search_in_public_tasks.description: Option for searching in public tasks (requires TI license)
search_in_public_tasks.name: search_in_public_tasks

actions.description: Get reports of a specific file analysis by that file's hash
actions.verbose: This action requests a list of already completed reports of a file analysis. Option search_in_public_tasks enables search in public submissions, which requires ANY.RUN TI License to work, and is disabled by default. By default, only 100 recent submissions from your own submission history are used for search.

search_in_public_tasks.description: Option for searching in public tasks (requires TI license)
search_in_public_tasks.name: search_in_public_tasks

actions.description: Get reports of analyses, that involve specific domain
actions.verbose: This action requests a list of already completed reports of analyses, where requested domain was involved. This action requires ANY.RUN TI License.

actions.description: Get reports of analyses, that involve specific IP
actions.verbose: This action requests a list of already completed reports of analyses, where requested IP was involved. This action requires ANY.RUN TI License.

actions.description: Get report for a submission
Get report for a submission in STIX format
Get report for a submission in MISP format
Get report for a submission in HTML format
Get list of IoCs for a submission
Detonate a URL
actions.verbose: This action requires a URL for ANY.RUN service to analyse. All other parameters are optional - for more information about them refer to official documentation (https://any.run/api-documentation/).

env_type.description: Type of the operation system (Default: complete)
env_type.name: env_type

opt_network_residential_proxy_geo.description: Residential proxy geo location option (Default: fastest)
opt_network_residential_proxy_geo.name: opt_network_residential_proxy_geo

actions.description: Threat Intelligence IoC Lookup
actions.verbose: Perform investigative actions by using the ANY.RUN Threat Intelligence Portal API method. This action requires ANY.RUN TI License. For more information about available parameters refer to official documentation (https://any.run/api-documentation/).

value_list: Domain Observed Used for C2 Detected
